DarkMouse::
She kept her pistol aimed at him. "Magnus? Galvatron?"  She looked at 
him with a puzzled look on her face. For a brief moment, her optics 
saw blurred images of things that had been. She slapped her hand 
against her head. "Why can't I remember?" as she snapped at herself.  
She saw him sit down. She relaxed a bit and lowered her pistol. But 
she kept it in her hand.  "Where have I been? I've been sleeping. You 
know, Hybernating. Things got to hot for a while, so I just made 
myself disappear. Hey, that's what us rodents do best." She gave him 
a half a smile. She was uneasy about this bot. He was so nice and 
friendly. Was he a maximal? "Your not a maximal are you?" as she 
narrowed her optics at him and slowly raised her gun again.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  He smiled. "Im sure youve heard of me. My name is Galvatron. I 
know you bec 
> once Magnus was  a friend of yours and I do contain memories from 
that 
> experience. And the emotions of careing and understanding of you 
that came 
> with. He is running around on this planet somewhere I am sure. But 
right now 
> I wish just to talk to you." he sat down n a rock. "Where have you 
been all 
> this time?"
